==Chests==
# '''Exquisite Chest''' in the hallway, on top of the stairs. Unlocks after defeating a Primal Construct: Prospector.
# '''Common Chest''' behind a gate. After pressing 'Start' on the first mechanism, drop down and defeat 3 sleeping Scorpions to unlock the gate and the chest.
